description: Yummy soft cookies with a nice crunch from the sprinkles. A big hit with the kids.
keywords: Cookie,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Vegetarian,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Peanut free
name: Condensed Milk Cookies Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tsp vanilla extract (to make vanilla flavoured cookies)
1 tbs cocoa powder (to make chocolate flavoured cookies)

recipeInstructions.text: Cream butter with an electric mixer on low speed for around 3 minutes, until light and fluffy. Add condensed milk and beat until combined.*If making vanilla flavoured cookies, add vanilla extract with condensed milk.
Sift in flour and beat until it forms a soft dough.*If making chocolate flavoured cookies, sift in cocoa powder with the flour.
Roll the mixture into teaspoon sized balls, then roll the balls into sprinkles to cover. Place balls into a plate/tray lined with baking paper and refrigerate for an hour.
Preheat oven to 160Â°C. Put balls on to a baking tray lined with baking paper and bake for 12 minutes. *Adjust baking time if making bigger or smaller cookies.
Let cool on the tray for a few minutes before moving to a wire rack to cool completely. Store in an airtight container at room temperature.
